arts.ttl: Chris Brunt says what everyone is thinking about Carlos Corberan's West Brom exit
arts.sum: “Carlos did a great job here for two years and left us in a better place than when he came in, and you can’t say that often. Chris Brunt has paid tribute to Carlos Corberan after being thrust into a front-line role following the Spaniard’s exit.

arts.ttl: Jerry Yates ends scoreless run as Derby beat managerless West Brom
arts.sum: Life without Carlos Corberan began with a 2-1 loss at Pride Park

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v West Brom as super trio score 8/10 amid big Rams win - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Derby raced out of the blocks early on and nearly took a quick lead when Kane Wilson produced a wonderful cross to pick out Jerry Yates who was denied by Alex Palmer. Jacob Widell Zetterstrom then made a terrific save to thwart Alex Mowatt before Derby gave themselves some breathing space when Mason Holgate deflected Kayden Jackson's shot past Palmer.

arts.ttl: Jerry Yates ends scoreless run as Derby beat managerless West Brom
arts.sum: Life without Carlos Corberan began with a 2-1 loss at Pride Park.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne in double Derby County change as he names team to face West Brom
arts.sum: Derby (4-2-3-1): Zetterstrom; Wilson, Nelson, Phillips, Elder; Goudmijn, Adams; Jackson, Harness, Mendez-Laing; Yates Coming into replace them are offensive changes in Nathaniel Mendez-Laing and Marcus Harness with the duo expected to be part of a shift in formation from a back three to a back four.

arts.ttl: West Brom next manager twist as club receives Mark Robins response
arts.sum: Mark Robins, who was sacked by Coventry City last month, was the early bookies’ favourite to succeed Corberan, followed by three managers who have all been axed by Premier League clubs this season, in Steve Cooper, Gary O’Neil and Russell Martin. Posting on social media platform X, Corberan said: “I cannot begin to explain how I feel about West Bromwich Albion, its fans and everyone associated with the club.

arts.ttl: Worst haircut? Best fashion sense? | West Brom players rank themselves!
arts.sum: West Brom players Jayson Molumby, John Swift, Karlan Grant, Kyle Bartley and Alex Mowatt take on Team Rates, where they must rank each other from 1 to 5 on a number of different topics.

arts.ttl: West Brom sporting director issues next manager update after Shilen Patel decision
arts.sum: Posting on social media platform X, Corberan said: “I cannot begin to explain how I feel about West Bromwich Albion, its fans and everyone associated with the club. Corberan has departed The Hawthorns to join La Liga club Valencia as their new head coach on a deal until June 2027.

arts.ttl: West Brom next manager favourite emerges as Shilen Patel makes decision
arts.sum: Corberan has departed The Hawthorns to join La Liga club Valencia as their new head coach on a deal until June 2027 . Mark Robins is the early favourite to be the next West Brom boss, following Carlos Corberan’s exit.

arts.ttl: Carlos Corberan reveals West Brom return wish as Shilen Patel breaks silence
arts.sum: Carlos Corberan has broken his silence on leaving West Brom for Valencia. Corberan has departed The Hawthorns to join the La Liga club as their new head coach on a deal until June 2027 .
